name: Truelse
description:
Credits to Smol Gremlin#4962 for the sprites!

Truelse is truly a idea never seen before,whilst it's not complete yet, it's' show a new possibility to make platformers more engaging. 

The game itself is very simple, you'll have to resolve puzzles and answer the riddle correctly in order to pass to the next level. 

For the moment everything has been made simple just to see if this idea would work and if I see a minimal amount of support, I will develop it into a final product in the future.
